messages.content:
Let's play tic-tac-toe. I start and put and o in the center 
  |  | 
  |o|  
  |  | 
your move
I will place a cross (x) in the top right corner.
I will put a o in the top center. Drawn for me the resulting position before and after your move

Sure, here's the updated tic-tac-toe board:


```css
  |  | 
  |o|  
  |  | 

```

And after your move:


```css
  |  | 
  |  | 
  |  | 

```

It's my turn again, I will place a cross (x) in the top left corner.
